summary: A computer malfunction causes a science researcher to be sent back in time with her laptop, which she uses to amaze the court.
cast: Whoopi Goldberg|Michael York|Paloma Baeza|Simon Fenton|James Coombes|Robert Addie|Ian Richardson|Amanda Donohoe|Lukács Bicskey|Gabriella Csizmadia|Gabi Fon|John Guerrasio|Pál Makrai|Paul Rogan|Steve Speirs|Mariann Szalay|Béla Unger
keywords: solar eclipse|knights of the round table|back in time|technology|time travel comedy
title: Desmadre en Camelot
